Synthesia’s screen recorder transcribes what you say in the recording, makes an AI avatar say it for you—fear of bed-hair instantly gone—and automatically removes those filler-words (um, ah, eh) that distract your audience. 

You don’t even need a camera!

Synthesia is the number #1 AI video editor worldwide, with ⭐️ 4.7 stars on G2.com. 1 million users make videos in Synthesia without the need for expensive sets, cameras, editing software or actors.

We’re used by half of the Fortune 500 in their day-to-day work. Now with our AI screen recorder Synthesia gives you yet another way to make quality video content that is evergreen, editable, and ready to share with your colleagues and the outside world.

KEY FEATURES:

🎥 Record your screen, microphone and internal computer audio
🔒 Content Blur: Apply Blur to any element on the tab to hide sensitive content from the recording
🗣️ Automatic Transcription: Convert your voiceover to text effortlessly
🙋🏻‍♀️ AI Avatar: Your words are read out by an AI avatar (no camera necessary!)
✂️ Filler Word Removal: Enhance your video by eliminating unnecessary filler words
🎬 Scene Splitting: Automatically divide your video into logical, easy-to-follow scenes
🎤 Voiceover Alignment: Perfectly sync your voiceover with the video
✈️ Share your video with colleagues for review before publication

📽️ Screen Recorder

- Record your screen, microphone and internal computer audio
- An AI Avatar will then read your script for you in Synthesia (no camera required)

- Add camera blur to hide sensitive information

✂️ Video Editing

- Easily edit your recording in Synthesia’s video editor
- Add animations, scene transitions, background music and more
- Share your work in progress with colleagues and let them edit alongside you
- Only one take required (because fully editable!)
- Translate your clip into 20+ languages automatically

💾 Share your video with just a link

- Using Synthesia’s very own media player in multiple languages
- Choose whether your video is private or public
- Download and embed as an MP4 on social media, websites and more
- Download as a SCORM package for integration into your LMS
- Update your video and retain the same link (no dead links!)
